entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
